1.label: Device orientation
1.description:
Parameter determines orientation of the Swipe in relation to its default position.
                Required for proper gestures recognition.

4.label: Buzzer signalling result of gesture recognition
4.description:
Acoustic signalling of gesture recognition result (using the built-in buzzer).
                Note: Parameter 4 is relevant only if parameter 2 is set to Enabled.

options.label: Successful and failed recognition is signalled

5.label: Powering mode - interval of updating the current mode
5.description:
This parameter determines how often the device checks if the USB power supply is connected and updates powering mode if needed.
                0 - powering mode is not updated
                1-1080 (in minutes) - time interval
                Default : (4 minutes)

6.label: Power saving mode (battery mode)
6.description:
This parameter determines operation of gesture detection when battery powered.
                When Standby Mode is selected, hold gesture must be performed to exit power saving mode and reactivate normal gesture recognition.
                The device in Standby Mode consumes the least battery life.
                When Simple Mode mode is selected, gesture recognition is always active, but only slowly performed gestures will be recognized properly (high battery consumption).

options.label: The Swipe does not enter power saving mode

7.label: Hold gesture to enter the menu
7.description: This parameter allows to choose if the menu can be entered using the Hold gesture

10.label: Scenes sent to the controller
10.description:
Defines which actions result in sending scenes to 1st Lifeline group
                1 - scenes for Flick UP gesture enabled
                2 - scenes for Flick DOWN gesture enabled
                4 - scenes for Flick LEFT gesture enabled
                8 - scenes for Flick RIGHT gesture enabled
                16 - scenes for clockwise circular gesture enabled
                32 - scenes for counter-clockwise circular gesture enabled
                Default setting: 15

options.label: Scenes for flick UP gesture enabled
Scenes for flick DOWN gesture enabled
Scenes for flick LEFT gesture enabled
Scenes for flick RIGHT gesture enabled
Scenes for clockwise circular gesture enabled
Scenes for CCW circular gesture enabled

11.label: Associations in Z-Wave network security mode
11.description:
Parameter defines how commands are sent in specified association groups: as secure or non-secure.
                Parameter is active only in Z-Wave network security mode.
                It does not apply to 1st Lifeline association group.
                1 - 2nd group Flick UP sent as secure
                2 - 3rd group Flick DOWN sent as secure
                4 - 4th group Flick LEFT sent as secure
                8 - 5th group Flick RIGHT sent as secure
                16 - 6th group Circular AirWheel sent as secure
                Default setting: 31

12.label: Control mode of 2nd-5th association groups and scenes
12.description:
Parameter allows to choose control mode for 2nd-5th groups and scenes.
                By default, Toggle Mode is active, meaning that a single flick turns ON
                the group and the same flick turns it OFF, doubled flicks are inactive.
                After disabling Toggle Mode a single flick will turn the device ON and the same flick doubled will turn it OFF.
                1 - Toggle Mode enabled for 2nd association group
                2 - Toggle Mode enabled for 3rd association group
                4 - Toggle Mode enabled for 4th association group
                8 - Toggle Mode enabled for 5th association group
                Default setting: 15

options.label: Toggle Mode enabled for 2nd association group
Toggle Mode enabled for 3rd association group
Toggle Mode enabled for 4th association group
Toggle Mode enabled for 5th association group

13.label: Rate of smooth level control
13.description:
Parameter allows to choose how long the hand has to be held near the center of the pad after AirWheel gesture for the associated devices to reach their maximum/minimum level.
                0-10 - duration in seconds
                255 - default settings of controlled devices

20.label: Switch ON control frame value for Flick UP gesture
20.description:
This parameter allows to set value sent in switch ON command frame to the association group.
                0-99 or 255

21.label: Switch OFF control frame value for Flick UP gesture
21.description:
This parameter allows to set value sent in switch OFF command frame to the association group.
                0-99 or 255

22.label: Switch ON control frame value for Flick DOWN gesture
22.description:
This parameter allows to set value sent in switch ON command frame to the association group.
                0-99 or 255

23.label: Switch OFF control frame value for Flick DOWN gesture
23.description:
This parameter allows to set value sent in switch OFF command frame to the association group.
                0-99 or 255

24.label: Switch ON control frame value for Flick LEFT gesture
24.description:
This parameter allows to set value sent in switch ON command frame to the association group.
                0-99 or 255

25.label: Switch OFF control frame value for Flick LEFT gesture
25.description:
This parameter allows to set value sent in switch OFF command frame to the association group.
                0-99 or 255

26.label: Switch ON control frame value for Flick RIGHT gesture
26.description:
This parameter allows to set value sent in switch ON command frame to the association group.
                0-99 or 255

27.label: Switch OFF control frame value for Flick RIGHT gesture
27.description:
This parameter allows to set value sent in switch OFF command frame to the association group.
                0-99 or 255

30.label: Sequence learning mode
30.description:
Parameter activated by the main Z-Wave controller.
                Change its value to launch sequence learning procedure for the desired slot.
                0 - learning mode disabled
                1-6 - launch sequence learning for selected slot

31.label: 1st gestures sequence (SLOT 1)
31.description: Value containing sequence of gestures. See Sequences of gestures on page 12 for more information.

32.label: 2nd gestures sequence (SLOT 2)
32.description: Value containing sequence of gestures. See Sequences of gestures on page 12 for more information.

33.label: 3rd gestures sequence (SLOT 3)
33.description: Value containing sequence of gestures. See Sequences of gestures on page 12 for more information.

34.label: 4th gestures sequence (SLOT 4)
34.description: Value containing sequence of gestures. See Sequences of gestures on page 12 for more information.

35.label: 5th gestures sequence (SLOT 5)
35.description: Value containing sequence of gestures. See Sequences of gestures on page 12 for more information.

36.label: 6th gestures sequence (SLOT 6)
36.description: Value containing sequence of gestures. See Sequences of gestures on page 12 for more information.
